titles.title: Rabbi Arthur Schneier Congressional Gold Medal Act
To award a Congressional Gold Medal to Rabbi Arthur Schneier in recognition of his pioneering role in promoting religious freedom and human rights throughout the world, for close to half a century.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/14/2013--Introduced. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Congressional Gold Medal Act - Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President pro tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation, on behalf of Congress, of a gold medal to Rabbi Arthur Schneier in recognition of his pioneering role in promoting religious freedom and human rights throughout the world.
